name: @socketsupply/ltp
description: A schemaful parseless binary format, like a simpler version of captnproto. fast access to fields without allocating memory

scripts.build-c: node test/generate.js c > test/build/ltp.c && clang -nostdlib --target=wasm32 test/build/ltp.c -Wl,--no-entry -Wl,--export-all -o test/build/ltp.wasm
scripts.build-zig: node test/generate.js zig > test/build/ltp.zig && zig build-lib -target wasm32-freestanding -dynamic --export-table test/build/ltp.zig && mv ltp.wasm test/build/ltp.wasm
scripts.test-wasm: npm run test-js && npm run build-c && node test/wasm.js && npm run build-zig && node test/wasm.js
scripts.test: npm run test-js && npm run test-wasm

author: Dominic Tarr
